heading: Food industry and trade.
general-note: Here are entered works on the processing of food in general and on the marketing of processed food products. Works on the processing of specific kinds of food products are entered under the heading for the specific product with the subdivision. Processing. or under the heading for the industry. General works on the processing of agricultural products are entered under. Agricultural processing.. Works on a specific aspect or method of processing are entered under the heading for the specific process..
